001package edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.service;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.dao.AlertDao;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.entity.Alert;
006import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
007import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Observable;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Scheduler;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
010import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.Timer;
013import java.util.TimerTask;
014import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
015import javax.inject.Inject;
016import javax.inject.Singleton;
017
018@Singleton
019public class AlertRepository {
020
021  public static final int START_VALUE = 0;
022  public static final int INITIAL_DELAY = 0;
023  public static final int ONE_SECOND_PERIOD = 1;
024  private final AlertDao alertDao;
025  private final PreferencesRepository repository;
026
027  /**
028   * This repository links the view models to the countdown timer and the password checker
029   * @param alertDao
030   * @param repository
031   */
032  @Inject
033  public AlertRepository(AlertDao alertDao, PreferencesRepository repository) {
034    this.alertDao = alertDao;
035    this.repository = repository;
036  }
037
038  /**
039   * The getCountdownTimer method receives countdownDelay from the AlertViewModel and returns
040   * both the countdown and a completion event to signal the countdown has ended
041   * @param countdownDelay
042   * @return
043   */
044  public Observable<Long> getCountdownTimer(int countdownDelay) {
045    return Observable
046        .intervalRange(START_VALUE, countdownDelay+1, INITIAL_DELAY, ONE_SECOND_PERIOD, TimeUnit.SECONDS, Schedulers.single())
047        .map((value) -> countdownDelay - value);
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * This method does the actual work of checking the password against the correct password stored
052   * in the Preferences Repository
053   * @param enteredPassword
054   * @return
055   */
056  public boolean checkPassword(String enteredPassword) {
057    return repository.getPassword().equals(enteredPassword);
058  }
059
060}
